question: Simone Biles is associated to which sports?
explanation: American artistic gymnast Simone Biles broke the all-time record for most medals by any gymnast at the world championships by winning the balance beam competition at the 2019 World Gymnastics Championship in Stuttgart, Germany. She surpassed Belarusian Vitaly Scherbo\'s record 23 world medals by winning her 24th and 25th world medals (both gold).
